summary: Most requested features appear to be implemented: DRC added to at least About + Footer coverage text, contract details added to client/transporter registration and backend types, admin dashboard now includes spreadsheet-style client/transporter views with CSV export utilities, and an APK link setting is added. However, the backend APK link getter is not admin-restricted as required, and some implemented additions (e.g., contract start/end dates, ad settings/brand/contact changes) were not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend provides admin-only methods to get and set the APK download URL (stored persistently in canister state).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `setAndroidApkLink` enforcing admin authorization, but `getAndroidApkLink` has no admin check and is callable by anyone. This violates the 'admin-only methods to get and set' requirement (at least for the getter).

hallucinated_features.description: Added contract start/end date fields as part of contract details (beyond a simple 'Contract Details' text field).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies capturing/storing “Contract Details” (text) for admin spreadsheet viewing; it does not request additional structured fields like startDate/endDate.

hallucinated_features.description: Ad settings management UI/logic in the Admin Dashboard (ad snippet enable/reset/preview).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-38 through REQ-43 (and non-goals exclude external integrations but do not mention ad configuration).

hallucinated_features.description: Brand/content changes unrelated to the listed requirements (e.g., renaming/brand references, contact detail updates, always-visible Admin link in nav).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-38 through REQ-43; these appear as additional scope beyond the BuildRequest items.
